subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic was seeded No. 1 at the United States Open for the first time, followed by the defending champion, Rafael Nadal, and the five-time winner Roger Federer.
snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic was seeded No. 1 at the United States Open for the first time, followed by the defending champion, Rafael Nadal, and the five-time winner Roger Federer.
